heroPerk.name: Brain Freeze
heroPerk.description: When <HeroAbility>D.E.C.O.Y.</> is destroyed it explodes in a frigid blast that freezes all enemies in a <Number>1</> tile radius for <Number>3</> seconds.

commanderPerk.name: Brain Freeze +
commanderPerk.description: When <HeroAbility>D.E.C.O.Y.</> is destroyed it explodes in a frigid blast that freezes all enemies in a <Number>[Ability.Line3]</> tile radius for <Number>3.7</> seconds. Additionally, anytime a frozen enemy is eliminated there is a <Number>100%</> chance to summon a <ModifiedAttribute>Phantasm</> (targets a nearby enemy, dealing <Number>62</> base  <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a <Number>0.5</> tile radius, <Number>1.5</> second cooldown).

abilities.name: DECOY
abilities.description: Deploy a D.E.C.O.Y. which distracts nearby enemies for [Ability.Duration] seconds. Does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

abilities.name: Plasma Pulse
abilities.description: Deploy a device which spews plasma mines for [Ability.Duration] seconds. Each mine deals [Damage.Value] energy damage.

abilities.name: R.O.S.I.E.
abilities.description: Deploy a mountable turret which deals [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fires [FireRate.Value] shots per second. R.O.S.I.E. has [Ability.Duration] ammo.

recruitment.sourceText: Earned through the "Eye of the Brainstorm" questline.
